column1: This describes the work flow for managing the scoretility database.
* create races file as described in `http://www.steeplechasers.org/scoretility/doc/importraces <http://www.steeplechasers.org/scoretility/doc/importraces>`_
* copy previous year's series - make any changes required for the new year
* edit each series, checking the races which are part of that series
